author: jt.aussiegingersnap
title: Game Asset Analytics [Revelar]
description: Visualizing NFT movement and interactions through on chain explorers is confusing and complex.
solution: Create a web app dashboard with key metrics for game asset NFT's so game makers have a clear view & tracking of their content.
experience: A decade as a Tech Founder & CTO + Plutus Pioneer + Fund 6 + alongside a full team of engineers. (See below)
